page.title: 19WESTON MAY FAIR
page.content: Each year on the first Saturday in May Weston has a May Fair.We have stalls for "White Elephant"and tombola.Next the children of Weston dance.The fair is held for evrybody in the church hall.This year which is 1985 we are presenting a pantomine with singing and dancing.We have been giving these shows for four years but before we just had stalls.We always have do lots sorting out before the day.We wear different costumes so we have to get changed all the time but it isn't very easy because there is only a little stage.On the stalls we have refresh- ments and lots of jumble and other things.We raise about two hundred pounds each year which we use for the church fund.Nearly all of Weston vill- age come but last year not many dads came was cup final day.I hope success this year like the other years.
